mapper.select: SELECT o.FG_ORDER_DATE AS 주문날짜, pf.FG_PRODUCT_FILE_ROOT || '/' || pf.FG_PRODUCT_FILE_NAME AS 상품사진, p.FG_PRODUCT_NAME AS 상품명, p.FG_PRODUCT_PRICE AS 상품가격, pick.FG_PICKUP_SCHEDULE AS 픽업예정시간, b.FG_BUSINESS_NAME AS 업체명, pick.FG_PICKUP_REQUEST AS 요청사항, pick.FG_PICKUP_STATUS AS 픽업여부 FROM FG_ORDER o, FG_PICKUP pick, FG_PRODUCT p, FG_PRODUCT_FILE pf, FG_BUSINESS b WHERE o.FG_ORDER_ID = pick.FG_ORDER_ID AND o.FG_PRODUCT_ID = p.FG_PRODUCT_ID AND p.FG_PRODUCT_ID = pf.FG_PRODUCT_ID AND p.FG_BUSINESS_ID = b.FG_BUSINESS_ID AND o.FG_USER_CODE = #{fgUserCode}
